resources.string:
Welcome to Atlas

 • In Atlas, the one who plays first (P1) has to name a valid place and P2 has to give another valid place starting from the end alphabet of the initial place given by the opposition(P1).
 User wins if he/she inputs 10 correct places against computer.
 No place should be repeated in a given round.
 • "Hard mode" : Only countries will be accepted as valid places.
 • "Easy mode" : Countries, states and cities will be accepted as valid places.
 • "1on1 mode" : You can play against your friend here.
